guest.name: Uri Levine
guest.title: Co-founder of Waze & Author
guest.background: Uri Levine is a serial entrepreneur best known as the co-founder of Waze, the world's largest community-based traffic and navigation app acquired by Google. He has founded or advised over 50 startups and is the author of 'Fall in Love with the Problem, Not the Solution'.
guest.background_zh: Uri Levine 是一位连续创业者，最著名的身份是 Waze（全球最大的社区化交通导航应用，后被 Google 收购）的联合创始人。他创立或指导了超过 50 家初创公司，并著有畅销书《爱上问题，而不是解决方案》。

episodeSummary: Uri Levine returns to discuss the inevitable nature of crises in startups, categorizing them into cash crises and loss of Product-Market Fit. He provides a tactical playbook for founders on how to make rapid, difficult decisions to extend runway, how to retain teams through transparency, and a step-by-step algorithm for deciding when and how to pivot.
episodeSummary_zh: Uri Levine 再次做客节目，深入探讨了初创公司危机不可避免的本质，将其归纳为现金流危机和 PMF（产品市场匹配）缺失危机。他为创始人提供了一套实战指南，涵盖如何通过快速且艰难的决策来延长资金跑道，如何通过透明度留住团队，以及决定何时及如何进行转型（Pivot）的算法步骤。
